testcase.name: Long Time Data Transmission Stress Test
testcase.summary: test long time data transmission stability of balboa platform
testcase.preconditions: install auto test app on android mobile phone

step.actions: download ble_app_throughput project bin in balboa platform

open auto test app at mobile phone, set test params as:   

  1.test time: 43200

  2.test count: 1

  3.scan time: 30

  4.test case: goodix_throughput

  5.test device: choice balboa name and address

  6.press down start test button
step.expectedresults: auto test app switch to throughput test page successfully

step.actions: waiting app test finish, record test result and compare with pass standard
step.expectedresults:
app test finish successfullly

pass standard:

1. app test result is pass

2. data throughput rate should larger than 500
